data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vila-Farré, Miquel, Sluys, Ronald, Almagro, Ío, Handberg-Thorsager, Mette, Romero, Rafael (2011): Freshwater planarians (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida) from the Iberian Peninsula and Greece: diversity and notes on ecology. Zootaxa 2779: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206798
